name: SPACE JAM - An Adventure
description:
the themes for this game jam were:

1) Jammed 

2) Space 

You have crashed into a weird solar system, there is a weird coating on your tools that has a JAM like texture, Dang it it seem like we have a Jammed comms system.

make your way around the new world and try to find your way out.

having your powered jump on you side you should be more than capable.

Controls:

W,A,S,D = movement 

Space = Jump

Mouse movement = camera movement.

Note, the victory screen button is not playing nice, so a force quit may be needed.
